name: Asteroids-X
description:
Asteroids is back!

Head to space and blast those rocks, but be careful, the cosmos isn't as unpopulated as it once was. Face the fierce ravagers, an alien species that uses asteroids as their shells, and mysterious U.F.O.s which will challenge your dogfighting skills!

Compete with your friends and try to get to the top of the scoreboard, but most importantly, have fun!
